title: Searching DIA3+ MID AND SUPP FOR PRO TEAM SINN/BENELUX TEAM (BNL-GE-EN)
body:
Hey guys,

We, Dream eSports are currently looking for a Mid and Support to complete our DREAMS TITANS Team.
We are a Company/Organisation that strives to become professional and with over 5 pro teams and 20 community Teams and more than 50 to 100 members joining daily we already accomplished that goal.
The Goal of this team is to compete in leagues like SUMMONERSINN (local LEC)(GERMAN) or tournaments Online/Offline in the BENELUX .

So having mention our goals here are our expectations.

Atleast D3+ (Preferably higher since most of our members are high Diamond)
18+ 
Able to use voicechat (Discord)
Able to maintain a set training schedule and set matches in the weekends
Willing to invest in a longer term relationship
A positive mindset looking to improve
Open to criticism
Preferably some experience in 5v5 tournaments/semi-competitive play (Mainly the differences between SoloQ and coordinated 5v5 games)


What can you expect from us?

We already have 3 People being the JNG MID and ADC so our Team is getting filled quickly.
A real opportunity to play in a competitive environment alongside other teams.
A personal Coach and Analyst as well as a Teammanager.
A positive mindset focused on improving and teambonding.
High skill caps in the roles we have been playing for years.
Flexible schedules in terms of playtime and practice time.
Possibility of sponsorship when we start to perform well.


If you feel like you could be the one player we need, dont hesitate to join our discord and talk to one of our managers who will lend you a helping hand as fast as they can !

With all that being said, I hope to see you soon on our discord and in our Team trying to proof that you belong where you try to get !
 
Discord: https://discord.gg/9Qnv2eB
IGN: MBG JK
Kind regards,


Dream Esports
